synopsis.text: Eiji Kitahama is a second-year high school student who dreams of gaining popularity and being remembered. To pursue acting, he joins his school's drama club. There, he meets Rin Nanakura, a first-year student who also joins the club. Rin secretly harbors feelings for Eiji. To help him become a better actor, she begins roleplaying different female character archetypes that express affection toward him. One day Rin acts as a tsundere, the next as an ordinary girl. But despite the ever-changing personalities, the underlying fondness for Eiji remains constant. Through her dedicaton, Rin strives to improve Eiji's acting skills. The colorful cast of characters she inhabits entertains and surprises Eiji daily. However, he remains unaware of the genuine feelings behind Rin's performances. As the two drama club members spend more time together, Eiji gets first-hand experience expressing and receiving affection. But will he ever recognize that his co-star's admiration is more than just an act? The future of this amusing high school romance remains to be seen.
